top_comments.comment: Well, we have to admit that Chucky is way sexier than Dave
Sh!t, I’m not a psychopath doll 😔

comments_since_last_sample.body: This rendition was beautifully haunting, amazing job!
Finally hearing this song played the way I always heard it in my head <3
I have never been more jealous of Chucky than I am now lol,
Sounds great but how the hell are you going to remove the most iconic part of this song?!
I came for the drum 🥁 yet I’m still here 🤘🏻
I would love to see violet cover the power rangers theme with halocene
I think you can do original work and the Melodica Brothers and Violet Orlandi Can both do Great Covers but Please Keep Doing Collaborations.

I love how music and lyrics can have a different interpretation to the listener vs what the original artist was trying to convey. 

Good job! Loved this version. Wish we had more of the powerful ending. Those high notes and belts are perfect!
1:59 I kind of half-expected Chucky to stand up and start singing around this point.
